snippet: It is unclear how long Kirby Wilson, who has been the Steelers’ running backs coach for five seasons, will remain in the hospital and when he might be able to return to work.
abstract: Pittsburgh Steelers assistant coach Kirby Wilson is seriously burned in a fire at his home; it is unclear how long Wilson will remain in the hospital and when he might be able to return to work.
lead_paragraph: It is unclear how long Kirby Wilson, who has been the Steelers’ running backs coach for five seasons, will remain in the hospital and when he might be able to return to work.

headline.seo: Burns Are Not Life-Threatening for Steelers Coach Kirby Wilson
headline.main: Steelers Assistant Sustains Burns in a House Fire
headline.print_headline: Steelers Assistant Is Burned In a Fire
